mapper.update: update prepare_goods_records set agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_id = #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_list = #{terminalList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agent_id, good_id, quantity, created_at, updated_at, process_user_id, pay_channel_id, terminal_list from prepare_goods_records where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
